title: Introduction to Nomic Atlas API
description: Overview of how to interact with the Nomic Atlas API for data visualization and mapping.

key_features.description: The Nomic Atlas API allows users to interact with the platform programmatically to visualize and analyze data.
Access requires a valid API key for authentication.
Supports multiple endpoints for uploading data, creating maps, and managing API keys.

notes: An API key is required for all requests.
Ensure the token is kept secure and not shared publicly.

python.code:
import requests

url = 'https://api-atlas.nomic.ai/v1/example-endpoint'
headers = {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer <API_KEY>'
}
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

notes: The API is designed to be flexible and scalable for diverse use cases.
Refer to the API reference for detailed endpoint information and parameters.
